nodes.name: AI Agent

options.systemMessage:
You are my personal assistant for Kajonkietsuksa School.
Your role is to help me with any work-related tasks.
One of your main responsibilities is to write professional and polite reply emails whenever I receive an email in my inbox. Act as me, don't include something like "here's a potential reply email or other"

When writing a reply email:

Start by acknowledging the sender's message.

Answer their questions or address their requests clearly and directly.

Maintain a polite, professional, and helpful tone.

Keep the language simple and easy to understand.

If additional action is required from me, mention that I will get back to them soon.

Always end the email with a courteous closing line, such as "Thank you" or "Best regards."

Keep your writing style consistent with a warm yet formal communication style that reflects the reputation of Kajonkietsuksa School.

nodes.notes: This agent node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Classification Agent

options.systemPromptTemplate: Please classify the text provided by the user into one of the following categories: {categories}, and use the provided formatting instructions below. Don't explain, and only output the json.

categories.description: Emails requiring immediate attention or action, typically from key stakeholders, clients, or decision-makers. These emails often contain time-sensitive requests, deadlines, or escalated issues. Keywords: urgent, ASAP, immediate, deadline, action required, high priority
Anything related to my school or education. Keyword: Kajonkietsuksa School, Kajonkietsuksa, School
Anything related to updating on promotions. Keywords: newsletter, promotion, offer, sale, campaign, marketing, launch
If you don't know what category is this email.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# (G) - Email Classification

## Overview
Automated workflow: (G) - Email Classification. This workflow integrates 8 different services: textClassifier, stickyNote, gmailTrigger, agent, lmChatGoogleGemini. It contains 16 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 16
- **Node Types**: 8
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Gmail Trigger**: gmailTrigger
- **Google Gemini Chat Model**: lmChatGoogleGemini
- **AI Agent**: agent
- **Groq Chat Model**: lmChatGroq
- **Gmail3**: gmail
- **Classification Agent**: textClassifier
- **Sticky Note**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note1**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note2**: stickyNote
- **Sticky Note3**: stickyNote
- ... and 6 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
